snippet: Ban Ki-moon, the secretary general of the United Nations, said on Saturday that the world had responded with “disturbing paralysis” to conflicts around the globe and their devastating impact on civilians.
lead_paragraph: Ban Ki-moon, the secretary general of the United Nations, said on Saturday that the world had responded with “disturbing paralysis” to conflicts around the globe and their devastating impact on civilians.

headline.main: U.N. Chief Says World’s Failure to Act on Suffering Is a ‘Disgrace’
headline.print_headline: U.N. Chief Says World’s Failure to Act on Suffering Is a ‘Disgrace’

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Committee of the Red Cross
